snippet: Hotels group Marriott International is planning to speed up the expansion of brands acquired in the takeover of rival Starwood, and is not ruling out further additions to its portfolio, its chief executive said on Monday....

headline.main: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe
headline.print_headline: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe

lead_paragraph: Hotels group Marriott International is planning to speed up the expansion of brands acquired in the takeover of rival Starwood, and is not ruling out further additions to its portfolio, its chief executive said on Monday.
